item.title: Continuously Optimize Your Website With Lighthouse CI
item.author: 作者
item.description: Performance has directly impacted the company’s bottom line. – Pinterest Intro Since the development of the Internet, web page performance has always been an important issue. All major Internet companies are sparing no effort to optimize their web pages, in order to allow users to see the content that users want to see faster. item.title: 使用 Lighthouse 持续优化你的 Web 性能
item.author: 作者
item.description: 性能是留住用户的关键， 性能直接影响公司的命运。 – Pinterest 介绍 互联网发展至今，网页性能始终是一个重要的问题, 各大互联网公司都在不遗余力的优化自己的 Web
